publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-737# Mr David Davidson: A90 Upgrade—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s announcement on the roads improvement programme and, in particular, the inclusion of a scheme to upgrade the Hatton Bends on the A90 near Peterhead, but believes that all of the single –carriageway sections of the Aberdeen to Peterhead road should be upgraded and that the construction of an Aberdeen bypass should proceed as a matter of urgency.
S1M-737# A90 Upgrade (lodged on 4 April 2000) Brian Adam*

S1M-737# Mr David Davidson: A90 Upgrade—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s announcement on the roads improvement programme and, in particular, the inclusion of a scheme to upgrade the Hatton Bends on the A90 near Peterhead, but believes that all of the single–carriageway sections of the Aberdeen to Peterhead road should be upgraded and that the construction of an Aberdeen bypass should proceed as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Brian Adam
S1M-737# A90 Upgrade (lodged on 4 April 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-737# A90 Upgrade (lodged on 4 April 2000) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-737# Mr David Davidson: A90 Upgrade—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s announcement on the roads improvement programme and, in particular, the inclusion of a scheme to upgrade the Hatton Bends on the A90 near Peterhead, but believes that all of the single–carriageway sections of the Aberdeen to Peterhead road should be upgraded and that the construction of an Aberdeen bypass should proceed as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-737# A90 Upgrade (lodged on 4 April 2000) Shona Robison*, Alex Neil*
S1M-737# A90 Upgrade (lodged on 4 April 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Nick Johnston*

S1M-737# Mr David Davidson: A90 Upgrade—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s announcement on the roads improvement programme and, in particular, the inclusion of a scheme to upgrade the Hatton Bends on the A90 near Peterhead, but believes that all of the single–carriageway sections of the Aberdeen to Peterhead road should be upgraded and that the construction of an Aberdeen bypass should proceed as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Brian Adam, Fergus Ewing, Nora Radcliffe, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Nick Johnston
